rhq:bundle.name: Java Petstore
rhq:bundle.description: a sample bundle consisting of JBossAS 6.0 running the Java Petstore application

rhq:input-property.name: jboss.bind.address
rhq:input-property.description: the IP address the JBoss AS server should bind to

rhq:input-property.name: http.port
rhq:input-property.description: the HTTP port the JBoss AS server should listen on

rhq:input-property.name: https.port
rhq:input-property.description: the HTTPS port the JBoss AS server should listen on

target.name: appserver-preinstall
target.echo: Installing Java Petstore App Server to ${rhq.deploy.dir}...

target.name: appserver-postinstall
target.echo: Done installing Java Petstore App Server to ${rhq.deploy.dir}.
